Title: Lagride expands fleet with 100 EVs, introduces new scheme
Summary: Lagride expands fleet with 100 electric vehicles as part of an ambitious plan to capture at least 70 per cent of the Lagos e-hailing market . Lagride is part of a government-backed e-taxi service, Lagride .

Title: Company initiates technology to tackle CO₂ emissions in industrial motor management
Summary: TeSys Deca Advanced contactor 115A & 150A for 3Pole and 200A for 4P to its channel partners in West Africa . Company initiates technology to tackle CO₂ emissions in industrial motor management .

Title: ‘Innovation, sustainability critical to transportation industry’
Summary: Experts in the transportation sector have emphasised the crucial role innovation and sustainability play in driving the industry . Experts say innovation, sustainability play a crucial role in the industry's success .

Title: JAC, Elizade deepens partnership, target Nigerian market share expansion
Summary: JAC Motors International and Elizade JAC Autoland Limited have deepened collaboration and shared vision of delivering world-class vehicles tailored to the Nigerian market . JAC, Elizad deepens partnership, target Nigerian market share expansion .

Title: U-20 World Cup: Flying Eagles back on track with Saudi win
Summary: Nigeria beat Saudi Arabia 3-2 in their second group game on Friday morning . The Flying Eagles of Nigeria are back on track to qualify for the knockout stages of the 2025 U-20 FIFA World Cup in Chile .

Title: Osun monarchs issue 21-day ultimatum to Oluwo over assassination claim against Ooni
Summary: Osun monarchs issue 21-day ultimatum to Oluwo of Iwo, Oba Abdulrosheed Akanbi . Ooni of Ife, Ooni Adeyeye Ogunwusi had in a viral video on social media .

Title: Functioning steel industry key to Nigeria’s maritime development — SEREC
Summary: The Sea Empowerment and Research Center, SEREC, emphasized the importance of a functioning steel industry to an efficient maritime sector in Nigeria . Head of Research, Eugene Nweke, said the steel industry is key to Nigeria’s maritime development .

Title: Court dismisses suit seeking refund of Rivers’ monies expended by Ibas
Summary: The judge upheld the objection raised by lawyers to the defendants, including Kehinde Ogunwumiju, SAN, who represented Ibas in the case .

Title: Cooking gas price rises 34.6% to N17,500 — Investigation
Summary: Refilling a 12.5kg cylinder of Liquefied Petroleum Gas, LPG, otherwise known as cooking gas, has increased by 34.6 percent on a Week-on-Week, WoW basis, to N17,500 this week, from N12,750 the previous week .

Title: Edo NSCDC commandant slumps, dies at public function
Summary: Agun Gbenga reportedly slumped and died shortly after delivering a speech . The incident occurred at the Bishop Kelly Pastoral Centre, off Airport Road, Benin City, during an event .
